DOC.brief_summary: The CRONOS-ADM (Coronary CT angiography evaluation for clinical outcomes in asymptomatic patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus) registry is a large, prospective observational registry of demographic, clinical and laboratory data with long-term clinical outcome of asymptomatic diabetic patients without history of CAD or angina or angina-equivalent symptoms at two affiliated hospitals of The Catholic University of Korea.
DOC.criteria: 1. Age > 18 years 2. Asymptomatic type 2 diabetes mellitus 3. Prospective data collection for CAD risk factors
